TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit Matrix3D extends System.ValueType implements class System.IFormattable

summary.span: 表示用于在三维 (3-D) 空间中进行转换的 4 × 4 矩阵。

span.span: Represents a 4 × 4 matrix that is used for transformations in a three-dimensional (3-D) space.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此结构表示 Windows 运行时 (WinRT) 结构的 .NET 投影 `Matrix3D` 。This struct represents the .NET projection of the Windows Runtime (WinRT) `Matrix3D` struct. 有关详细信息，请参阅 UWP API 参考中的 [Matrix3D](https://docs.microsoft.com/uwp/api/windows.ui.xaml.media.media3d.matrix3d) 。For more information, see [Matrix3D](https://docs.microsoft.com/uwp/api/windows.ui.xaml.media.media3d.matrix3d) in the UWP API reference.
